page.title: 08Main Road through Cliffe
page.content: The A63 road from Hull to Leeds crosses the main street of Cliffe village. It is a straight fast road and for a long time people have been worried about accidents at the cross roads, especially to children who have to cross the main road on their way to school. There are not many houses along the A63 and sometimes drivers do not know they are coming to a village. The Parish Council asked for lights to be put up at the crossroads, and for a {speed limit}on the A63. So many lights were put up that there should have been an automatic speed limit, but the Department of Transport fixed de-restriction signs on them, and says there is not enough traffic for a speed limit. Since the M62 was built most heavy traffic uses that rather than the A63.
